definition: Lichun or Beginning of Spring, 1st of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气[er4 shi2 si4 jie2 qi5] 4th-18th February
surname Li
to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
spring (season)/gay/joyful/youthful/love/lust/life
surname Chun

sentences.english: Chinese New Year will usher in the New Year the first solar term spring.
sentences.chinese: 春節後將迎來新年的第一個節氣“立春”。

sentences.english: "Rain" before and gas as "beginning of spring.
Today is the first day of spring . It`s a time when people feel energetic.
sentences.chinese: 今天是立春的日子，也是讓人感到充滿了新的憧憬。

sentences.english: To spring, it is clear that the day is longer, the sun warming the.
sentences.chinese: 時至立春，人們明顯地感覺到白晝長了，太陽暖了。

sentences.english: Insects awaken soon after the first day of spring.
sentences.chinese: 立春之後，很快就到了驚蟄。

sentences.english: This custom in Shaanxi is practiced right before the Start of Spring.
sentences.chinese: 陝西的習俗是要在立春之前就開始做春牛。

sentences.english: Today is the beginning of spring, the air was filled with the breath of spring.
sentences.chinese: 今天是立春，空氣中瀰漫着春天的氣息。

sentences.english: Do you know the origin of Spring begins?
Start of Spring lifts the curtain of spring.

definition: Chunfen or Spring Equinox, 4th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 21st March-4th April
solar term

Lesser Cold, 23rd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 6th-19th January

Jingzhe or Insects Wake, 3rd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 6th-20th March
Xiaoshu or Lesser Heat, 11th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-22nd July
twelfth lunar month
the 24 solar terms, calculated from the position of the sun on the ecliptic, that divide the year into 24 equal periods
February/second month (of the lunar year)
